iati-activity.title: PPA Results Monitoring July-Sept 2011
iati-activity.description: The Asia Foundation PPA with DFID CHASE is helping to address common challenges to peaceful state-society relations in fragile states, subnational conflict and post-conflict areas and transitional states at risk of renewed conflict. This activity represents results monitoring activities for the PPA during the period July-Sept 2011. This activity includes monitoring and evaluation activities in all countries covered by this PPA, along with regional oversight and technical support.
